source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_00<tab>The tiny trader would ask you to save the realm from a vegetal scourge.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_00<tab>エールポートの小柄な交易商人は、マンドラーズを倒してほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_01<tab>The tiny trader tells the fearsome tale of the Mandragoras, a band of rogue vegetables who will stop at nothing to overthrow their plant<var 1F /var>eating oppressors. Upon learning that you are the adventurer who bested the duelist Gilgamesh, he becomes convinced that you are the only one who can quash the vegetable insurrection. This might also afford you the perfect opportunity to reclaim the shipment of vegetables intended for Costa del Sol. Make for the Isles of Umbra, where a tyrannical vegetocracy rules with an iron fist, and pluck mandragora buds to ensure that their numbers do not grow.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_01<tab>小柄な交易商人によると、マンドラーズは奪った農作物の代わりにマンドラゴラの苗を植えていくことで、マンドラ帝国を作ろうとしているらしい。まずは西ラノシアの幻影諸島に渡り、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E956401 /var>」を摘もう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_02<tab>Angry screechings and squeakings in the distance give you the sense that someone is ill pleased with your plucking of the sproutlings, but the Mandragoras─and the foodstuffs they stole from Costa del Sol─are nowhere to be found. Perhaps Inspector Hildibrand has had more success in ascertaining their whereabouts.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E956401 /var>をすべて摘むことができた。幻影諸島に潜むマンドラーズから「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89BF01 /var>」を取り返そう。周囲にマンドラーズの気配がない場合は、「ヒルディブランド」に頼るといいだろう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_03<tab>You find Hildibrand buried arse<var 1F /var>up in the ground after a one<var 1F /var>sided skirmish with the Mandragoras, and in the next instant, the rogue vegetables are upon you. With the inspector unable to extricate himself in time, you single-handedly depose the vegetocracy and reclaim the pilfered foodstuffs. Return to Costa del Sol and deliver the goods to Lewenhart.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89BF01 /var>を取り返すことができた。東ラノシアのコスタ・デル・ソルにいる「レウェンハート」へ渡そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_04<tab>Lewenhart welcomes the return of the stolen foodstuffs, relieved that your efforts have spared him Guguremu's wrath. Confusion ensues upon inspecting the crate's contents, however, as the prized purple dragon peppers sought by Lewenhart are nowhere to be found, with peppers of a vivid blue in their place. Inspector Briardien quickly deduces that Lewenhart is none other than the phantom thief─he saw the peppers through red goggles while still in disguise as a Brass Blade. Before you can apprehend him, the fiend sprints off in the direction of north Bloodshore. Pursue him with all haste.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_04<tab>レウェンハートに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89BF01 /var>を渡した。中に入っていたのは、レウェンハートが言っていた紫竜辛子ではなく、真っ青なドラゴンペッパーであった。彼はマンドラーズに荷物を奪われた当時、ガーベラ連隊の特徴である赤いゴーグルを装着していたため、青い竜辛子を紫色と勘違いしてしまっていたのだ。ブリアルディアンに問い詰められたレウェンハートは、その場を逃げ出してしまった。まだ遠くへ逃げてはいないはずだ。東ラノシアで「レウェンハート」を見つけよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_05<tab>Your search of the shoreline turns up the true Lewenhart, incapacitated and left for dead by the thief days ago. Though your quarry has eluded you and likely assumed another identity, the maiden's virtue may yet be saved. Upon learning that the fiend suffered a wound to his right hand, Inspector Briardien sets off for Costa del Sol to inspect the hands of the banquet guests. While he investigates, accompany Hildibrand and Lewenhart to Wineport and see to Miss Arabella's safety.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_05<tab>砂浜で見つけたレウェンハートは、怪盗白仮面ではなく、本物のレウェンハートだった。怪盗白仮面は逃してしまったが、まだアラベラのことを諦めてはいないはずだ。東ラノシアのワインポートでレウェンハートの迎えを待っている、「アラベラ」の安全を確認しよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_06<tab>You find Arabella safe and sound, admiring the flowers in the gardens of Wineport. She explains that her betrothal to Vannes was arranged by their families years ago, and that she will be meeting her husband<var 1F /var>to<var 1F /var>be for the first time at the banquet. Though her heart is conflicted─and notwithstanding Inspector Hildibrand's not<var 1F /var>so<var 1F /var>subtle advances─she has nevertheless decided to honor the commitment in gratitude to her adoptive father, Guguremu, who took her in from the streets when she was but a babe.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SEQ_06<tab>アラベラから、婚約発表についての経緯を聞いた。彼女自身が望んでいる婚約ではないが、覚悟は決まっているようだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_00<tab>Pluck mandragora buds at the Isles of Umbra.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_00<tab>幻影諸島で<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E956401 /var>を摘む

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_01<tab>Reclaim the stolen foodstuffs from the Mandragoras.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_01<tab>マンドラーズから<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89BF01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the stolen foodstuffs to Lewenhart in Costa del Sol.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_02<tab>コスタ・デル・ソルのレウェンハートに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89BF01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_03<tab>Search for Lewenhart.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_03<tab>レウェンハートを探す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Arabella in Wineport.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_TODO_04<tab>ワインポートのアラベラと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_000<tab>To hear most say it, the Mandragoras are a nasty lot─a right pain in the arse to farmers and provisioners the realm over. But let me tell ye, friend, that ain't the least of it.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_000アンタ、話を聞いてくれるのか！
「マンドラーズ」は、農業関係者を襲って作物を奪い、
代わりにマンドラゴラの苗を植えていくんだ……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_001<tab>Freein' their fellow fronds from our larders and tables is but the beginning. The bulbous blackguards have a far grander scheme─revolution!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_001ヤツらは、ヒトと植物の支配関係をひっくり返して、
野菜国家……いわば「マンドラ帝国」を創ろうとしてる、
凶悪な魔物なんだよぉ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_002<tab>Madness, ye say? Take a ferry to the Isles of Umbra and see with your own eyes! A veritable vegetable kingdom where eggplants and turnips rule with an iron fist!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_002このままじゃ、幻影諸島もマンドラゴラだらけだ！
誰か、マンドラーズを止めねぇと……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_003<tab>Hm? This muscle-bound fellow with the dim expression─I could swear I've seen his face somewhere before...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_003……そういえば、隣の目立つムキムキマッチョ、
どこかで見たことがあるなぁ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_004<tab>...Bugger me! If it ain't the undead overlord what fancies himself a gentleman inspector!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_004あれは確か、経済誌「ミスリルアイ」の、
怪盗特集記事に載っていた……事件屋の似顔絵？
……そうだ、「事件屋ヒルディブランド」だ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_005<tab>Which would make you... Aye, could it be? The adventurer what bested the thievin' duelist in single combat!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_005そのお仲間の冒険者ということは……。
アンタ、武器怪盗「ギルガメッシュ」を倒した冒険者か！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_Q1_000_010<tab>Are you the one who bested the duelist?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_Q1_000_010<tab>ギルガメッシュを倒した冒険者か！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_A1_000_010<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_A1_000_010<tab>はい

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_A1_000_020<tab>No
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_A1_000_020<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_010<tab>Well, bugger me and call me Inspector! Tell me─is it true the duelist traveled with a demon bird whose crow could split the heavens?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_010やっぱり！　一連の事件は、こっちでもちょっとした話題さ！
……それにしても、アンタみたいな真面目そうな人が、
あの変態事件屋のお仲間たぁ、不思議なこともあるもんだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_015<tab>Not just brave, but humble, too. Hells, if it'd been me what did the deed, I'd be shoutin' my name from the top of every mountain in Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_015はっはっは、照れてるのかい？
隠すことはないさ。
武器怪盗の事件は、リムサ・ロミンサでもちょっとした話題だよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_020<tab>...But that's neither here nor there. Look, I dunno about you, but I ain't so keen on the notion of callin' a bloody tomato <var 1A 02 /var>Yer Grace<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_020世間を騒がせた武器怪盗を倒すほどの力を持ってるなら、
きっと「マンドラーズ」も倒せるだろう！？
たのむ、幻影諸島に向かってヤツらを倒し、野望を止めてくれ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_100_020<tab>And that's exactly the fate we're in for if we don't nip this revolution in the bud─and I mean that lit'rally.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_100_020俺の今回仕入れた野菜はどうなっててもいい。
ただ、このまま被害がでかくなるのは避けたいんだ！
それに、マンドラゴラだらけになるのは、もっと避けたい！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_021<tab>As we speak, the Mandragoras are plantin' themselves a whole army o' their own kind on the Isles of Umbra. You'd be doin' the whole realm a favor if ye could go there and uproot them 'fore the harvest comes.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_021幻影諸島にマンドラゴラの苗が埋められていたら、
ガンガン引っこ抜いてくれよ！
仕事が無くなるのも、野菜帝国なんてのも、まっぴらだからな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_022<tab>(-Hildibrand-)Many a case have I solved in my day, but I've not matched wits with sentient plant life before. This should prove quite exhilarating! To the Isles of Umbra!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_022(-ヒルディブランド-)それでは、決戦の地「幻影諸島」に向かいましょう！
私は「マンドラーズ」を探しておきますので、
マンドラゴラの苗を抜くのはお任せしましたぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_030<tab>I dunno about you, but I ain't so keen on the notion of callin' a bloody tomato <var 1A 02 /var>Yer Grace<var 1A 01 /var>. I'm beggin' ye, friend, make for the Isles of Umbra and nip the vegetable rebellion in the bud.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MERCHANT01439_000_030幻影諸島に向かってヤツらを倒し、野望を止めてくれ！
マンドラゴラの苗が埋められていたら、
ガンガン引っこ抜いてくれよ！

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MANDRAGORAA_000_040(-Distant Voice-)○×▽......!
◎◎×△□!!!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MANDRAGORAA_000_040(-遠くから聞こえる声-)○×▽……！
◎◎×△□！！

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MANDRAGORAB_000_041(-Distant Voice-)○○......?
×□○......
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MANDRAGORAB_000_041(-遠くから聞こえる声-)○○……？
×□○……。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MANDRAGORAC_000_042(-Distant Voice-)×□♪◎×◎.
□＄◎×△□◎◎......♪
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_MANDRAGORAC_000_042(-遠くから聞こえる声-)×□♪◎×◎。
□＄◎×△□◎◎……♪

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You feel a hostile gaze upon you...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>どこからか、小さな囁き声と、強烈な視線を感じる……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_060<tab>Friend! My pursuit of the Mandragoras has led me beneath the surface! Yes, they must be down here...unggghhh...somewhere!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_060くっ……不覚にも、発見したマンドラーズにやられました！
冒険者殿、気をつけてください……っ！
奴らは地中に逃げ込みましたぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_065<tab>Worry not, for I remain close in pursuit of our quarry! How fare you on the surface?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_065野菜とは思えない、鋭い殺気を感じます……！
マ、マンドラーズの討伐は任せましたぞ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_070<tab>Impeccably fought, my friend! I only wish I had seen the battle with my own eyes. You may go on ahead to Costa del Sol. I shall be along as soon as I extricate myself.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_070さすがです冒険者殿、無事に荷物を取り返せたようですな！
それではコスタ・デル・ソルに戻りましょう！
……なぁに、私もすぐに追いつきますぞ、ハッハッハ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_075<tab>What took you so long, friend? The Isles of Umbra are but a short sprint away. I trust you have brought along the goods we so bravely reclaimed?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_075ハッハッハ、先にコスタ・デル・ソルに戻っていましたぞ。
地面から脱出するのは大得意ですからな！
さあ、レウェンハート殿に荷物を渡してあげてください。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_080<tab>You return! I feared you might end up a tasty snack for a crazed head of cabbage.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_080「マンドラーズ」に奪われた荷物は、
取り戻せましたか……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_081<tab>The stolen foodstuffs! You've saved my hide today. Oh, but I must see if those purple dragon peppers are intact. Master Guguremu is quite particular about his seasonings...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_081ああ、よかった。
紫竜辛子は無事でしょうか……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_082<tab>Ooh! Can I come, too? I've never seen a purple dragon pepper before!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_082少し、海水で袋が濡れちゃってますね～。
レウェンハートさんの手袋がビショビショになる前に、
むこうで乾かしましょう～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_083<tab>That wild vegetable chase was a pleasant diversion, but it is time we returned to the case. Now, there must be some clue that yet eludes us...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_083冒険者殿が「マンドラーズ」を倒してくれたおかげで、
再び「怪盗白仮面」の調査に戻ることができますな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_84<tab>Cor! The peppers have changed color!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_84わわ、大変です～。
スパイスの色が変わっちゃってます～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_085<tab>What's this!? Peppers that possess the same powers of disguise as our many<var 1F /var>faced foe? A gentleman must needs investigate!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_085な、なんですって！？
スパイスの色が変わる……それは……
新たなスパイス詐欺事件の予感！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_086<tab>A striking shade of blue, quite far from the purple that Master Lewenhart described. Perhaps we recovered the wrong crate?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_086これは……鮮やかな青が特徴の「蒼」竜辛子だ。
レウェンハートが言っていた「紫」竜辛子とは違う。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_087<tab>But look here, Inspector! The crate is clearly marked for Costa del Sol. How curious...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_087でも、ちゃんと袋には、
コスタ・デル・ソルの印がついてましたよ～？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_088<tab>D-Did I say “purple?” I meant a purplish blue─or a bluish purple? The two colors are really quite similar, when you think about it.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_088あれ、おかしいな……。
ははは、きっと僕が見間違えたのでしょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_089<tab>These peppers have a most distinctive hue. No man could reasonably mistake it for <var 1A 02 /var>any<var 1A 01 /var> shade of purple.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_089<tab>青と紫を見間違えただって……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_100_089<tab>...Unless, of course, he was wearing a very particular sort of eyewear at the time.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_100_089それはもしや、ガーベラ連隊の「赤色のゴーグル」越しで、
「真っ青なドラゴンペッパー」を見てたから……か？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_090<tab>Hah! The charade is up. After the man!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_090やはり、そうだったか。
あいつは、レウェンハートに変装した「怪盗白仮面」だ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_091<tab>It is as I suspected all along─the goggles have proved the key to cracking the case! With speed, Nashu! The fiend must be brought to justice!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_091……は、ハッハッハ、私の推理どおりっ！
さぁ、皆で偽レウェンハート殿を追いますぞ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_100<tab>You can run, but you cannot...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_100<tab>見つけたか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_101<tab>Hah hah hah! If you thought you could outsprint this Manderville man, you were sorely mistaken!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_101ハッハッハ、私の推理どおり！
犯人は、海岸線沿いを逃げていましたな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_102<tab>For pilfering a priceless blade, threatening a maiden's virtue, and untold crimes against the law<var 1F /var>abiding citizens of Eorzea, I, Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire, hereby place you under arrest.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_102この事件屋ヒルティブランド、
ブリ殿より先に、犯人をエスコーーーーット！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_103<tab>Done in by a snipper─a fitting end for an ignoble thief. Let us see what lies behind the mask.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_103……フン、大蟹にでも絡まれたか？
無様な最後だな……さぁ、その馬鹿げた仮面を取ってやる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_104<tab>Unghhh... Wh-Where am I...? Who...are you?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_104<tab>あ……あなた方はいったい……！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_105<tab>Hah! Playing the fool will avail you naught! I suggest you come willingly. A gentleman is not given to violence, but should you attempt to resist, I disavow responsibility for any shattered skulls and broken bones.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_105<tab>とぼけても無駄ですぞ、「怪盗白仮面」殿！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_106<tab>W-Wait! I remember now! I was on my way to meet with Miss Arabella, when...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_106怪盗……白仮面……。
そ、そうだ、俺はガーベラ隊員に殴られて……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_107<tab>M-Miss Arabella! I must find her at once! Unggghhh, my head...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_107そうだ、アラベラ様……アラベラ様は！？
彼女をワインポートまで迎えに行かなければ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_108<tab>Hm. It would seem that <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> man wears no mask. This is the true Lewenhart.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_108マスクはついてないようだ。
ということは……本物のレウェンハートか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_109<tab>I swear on my life that it is so! I was en route to the estate in Wineport when one of the Brass Blades on patrol approached me. We exchanged greetings, and in the next instant, he turned on me.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_109……ええ、そのとおりです。
今朝、アラベラ様の所へ様子をうかがいに行こうとしたところ、
巡回に来たというガーベラ隊員に襲われたのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_110<tab>I fought desperately to defend myself, even managing to drive a kitchen knife into the man's right hand. In the end, though, he proved too strong for me...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_110なんとか応戦しようと、
奴の右手に一太刀浴びせたのですが……このザマです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_111<tab>Now that you mention it, the impostor was wearing gloves! I knew there was something suspicious about him!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_111あ〜、だからさっきのレウェンハートさんは手袋をしていて、
本物のレウェンハートさんは手袋をしていないんですね～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_112<tab>There is still time before the banquet begins. Knowing our quarry, he has doubtless already assumed a new identity.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_112パーティーの開場まで、もうしばらく時間がある。
「怪盗白仮面」は、別の人物に成りすまして、
アラベラを狙うはずだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_113<tab>And yet, he could not have foreseen this turn of events. It is unlikely that he had the time to thoroughly research his new target.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_113しかし、次の変装はやつにとって予定外……。
おそらく、レウェンハートの変装ほどの完成度は見込めない。
どこかで必ず、ボロが出る。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_114<tab>Most importantly, we now know that the thief suffered a wound to his right hand. We need simply return to Costa del Sol and examine the hands of all present.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_BRIARDIEN_000_114特に、レウェンハートが負わせた右手の傷は重要だ。
不自然に手を隠している者こそ、要注意だな……。
ぼくは会場に戻って、観客の手元を確認しよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_115<tab>An excellent plan, Inspector! While you do so, we shall accompany Lewenhart back to the estate, that we might ensure Miss Arabella's safety.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_115それでは、私たちはワインポートへ向かい、
アラベラ殿に会いに行きましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_116<tab>(-???-)I have found you, my little ones. Let me guess─you seethe with anger at those that took from you what was yours.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_116<tab>(-？？？？-)君たちは、あの冒険者に仕返しをしたいんだね？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_117<tab>(-???-)...Then it would appear our goals are in accord. Make for Costa del Sol and await my orders. When the time is right, revenge will be yours.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_117(-？？？？-)……なら、後で君たちが仕返しをするチャンスをあげる。
その時がきたら合図をするから、それまで隠れていなよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_118<tab>(-???-)The game is afoot, <var 1A 02 /var>Inspectors<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_118(-？？？？-)まだゲームは続いてるよ。
大いに盛り上げようじゃないか、事件屋さんたち……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_119<tab>(-???-)Now, what mask shall I wear to the ball?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_119<tab>(-？？？？-)……さて、次は誰になろうかな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_150<tab><gasp> Do I dream? But I must, for such beauty could not be of this world! A gentleman's heart swoons!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_150彼女がアラベラ殿ですかな？
噂どおり、美しい女性ですな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_200<tab>Miss Arabella, what are you doing out here!? You must return to the estate at once!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_200<tab>アラベラ様、また勝手に外に出られて……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_201<tab><sigh> Oh, Lewen...always the worrier. Your concern is touching, but I am a woman grown. Besides, I just wanted to see the flowers...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_201お花が綺麗だから見ていたかったのよ。
フフ、レウェンはいつも心配症ね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_203<tab>Lovely though these flowers may be, they are as unsightly weeds when measured against your beauty! I am Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire. Please, call me Hildy!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_203はじめまして、貴方が「るり色の乙女」殿ですかな？
私は、事件屋ヒルディブランドですぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_204<tab>The pleasure is mine, milord. Much have I heard of your deeds. Tell me: are these rumors of a many<var 1F /var>faced thief true?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_204まぁ、本物のヒルディブランド様ですか？
「ミスリルアイ」で拝見しております。
確か……「怪盗白仮面」様を追ってらっしゃるのですよね？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_205<tab>I fear they are, Miss Arabella. But still your gentle heart! For as long as Hildibrand is on the case, the fiend shall not lay a twisted finger upon you! This I swear on the Manderville name!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_205ええ、この事件屋ヒルディブランド、
犯人からアラベラ殿をお守りするために参上しましたぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_206<tab>The gods smile on me indeed, to send such a strong and handsome gentleman as my champion! And yet... <sigh>
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_206わあ、素敵！　ワクワクしちゃいます。
フフフ、なんだかお姫様になった気分です。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ELLIE_000_207<tab>You seem pensive, milady. Is something the matter?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ELLIE_000_207あら、思ったより楽しそうね。
婚約パーティーが台無しになるかもしれないのに。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_208<tab>To tell the truth, this marriage has been arranged against my wishes. I do not love Vannes. Why, I have not even met him...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_208……今回は、私にとっては望まぬ婚約なのです。
ヴァンネス様からは、一度だけ贈り物をいただいただけで、
お会いしたこともありません。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_100_208<tab>He sent me this clasp as a betrothal gift. “A treasure for my treasure─wear it always,” the message said. I do not care how beautiful it is─it might as well be a golden shackle!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_100_208いただいたのは、この首飾り……。
お手紙には「一生着けておくよう」と書かれていました。
……私にとっては、自由を縛る首輪のようなものです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_209<tab>M-Miss Arabella! You must not say such things!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_LEWENHART_000_209<tab>ア、アラベラ様、お言葉が過ぎますよ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_210<tab>An arranged marriage to a youth you have not even met!? Unconscionable!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_210ムムッ！？
ヴァンネス殿と会ったこともないのですか？
それなのに、なぜ婚約を？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_211<tab>Father says that this marriage must happen, that it is for the future of the family trade.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_211婚約自体は、10年前に父とモルガント様が決めたことです。
モルガント様とも、それ以来お会いしていません。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ELLIE_000_212<tab>Spoken like a true Ul'dahn. But if I may be bold, milady... Would I be correct in assuming that you and your father are not related by blood?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ELLIE_000_212父って言ってるけど……
お父さんはララフェル族で、あなたはヒューラン族よね。
もしかして、血の繋がりは無いのかしら？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_213<tab>Quite so. Father found me amongst the beggars on Pearl Lane when I was just a babe. He took me in and raised me as his own. He took Lewen in as well─though as servant rather than son.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_213ええ、そのとおりです。
貧民街で飢えていた幼少期に、引き取っていただきました。
実は、レウェンも私と同じ生い立ちなのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_214<tab>You may think Father a cold and miserly man, but to me, he is the man who gave me warmth and hope where I had none. I will learn to love Vannes, if that will make Father happy.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_214私たちにとって、父は救世主です。
そんな父の面目をつぶすわけにはいきませんからね、
私が婚約を断ることはできないのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_215<tab>You cannot be serious, Miss Arabella! You are a beautiful young woman with your whole life ahead of you! Surely you would not have to look far to find a gentleman with whom you would rather spend the rest of your days!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_HILDIBRAND_000_215むむ、いけませんな。
自分がしたいようにするのが一番ですぞ。
御覧ください、この解放的な私の姿を！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ELLIE_000_216<tab>...If I have to spend another <var 1A 02 /var>hour<var 1A 01 /var> with you, I'm like to lose my wits. But anyway, we should return to Costa del Sol and see how the inspector's investigation fares.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ELLIE_000_216……アンタはちょっと、自由すぎる例だけどね。
さぁ、そろそろ時間だわ。
皆でコスタ・デル・ソルに行きましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_217<tab>I, as well, must prepare for the banquet. Farewell, friends.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB303_01440_ARABELLA_000_217私は準備をしてから、レウェンと向かいますね。
コスタ・デル・ソルでお会いしましょう。
